## Launch QA Checklist

- [ ] Affiliate disclosure present where affiliate links exist
- [ ] Medical claims phrased with appropriate caveats
- [ ] Canonical + title + meta description + OG/Twitter updated
- [ ] Images have explicit dimensions and appropriate loading behavior
- [ ] Internal links and anchors verified (summary <-> long-form)
- [ ] robots/sitemap/schema remain valid
- [ ] Lighthouse budgets pass (Perf >=85, SEO >=95, BP >=95, A11y >=90)
